transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir Vineet baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ha bhai ji.
Executive: Ha sir Nimesh se nahi ho pa rahi bhai ji ek minute. Wo keh raha hai ki aapne call forward kar diya aap busy rahe honge us time par.
Customer: Are sir Monday ke din thoda pressure rehta hai baba. Monday wala din na halka sa matlab subah se hi dhandha rehta hai kuch na kuch uljha rehta hai.
Executive: Abhi aap kaha ho? Abhi abhi kaha ho aap?
Customer: Office office.
Executive: Office aa gaye?
Customer: Kab? Bilkul sir. Are pucho mat.
Executive: Are kab gaye the pehle wo batana yaar kab kya bolte kab gaye kab aaye aur kya bolte kaise wo batana bhai. Pehle tum bata do uske baad me kya hua kya problem kar rahe hai.
Executive: Sir sir gaye attend kiya raat ko hi nikal gaye waha se.
Executive: Fir seedha yaha pe.
Customer: Kitne baje mota moti?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Shanivar sham ko apan nikle yaha se Delhi se kitne baje?
Executive: Hum hum. Hum nikle the 4:30 baje ke aas paas.
Customer: Ah ah pahunche kab waha pe?
Executive: Morning me 6:00 baje pahunche.
Customer: Achha bahut ruk ruk ke gaye the. Ekdam aaram se raat beech me kya bolte soye bhi the kya karna?
Executive: Ha nahi matlab aise hi ruk ruk ke gaye. Fir thodi der idhar udhar ghume khana khaya chai pi idhar udhar.
Customer: Hmm. Fir attend jaldi jaldi jaldi jaldi ho gaya sab fir waha se nikle.
Executive: Matlab hum log nikal gaye the waha se 11:30 12 baje ke aas paas.
Customer: Subah sandhya kya bolte pahunch gaye the apan pahunch gaye uske baad?
Executive: Hmm. Uske baad yaha 9:30 10 baje tak pahunch gaye the morning me.
Executive: Sab log office hi aa gaye seedha.
Customer: Nahaye dhoye nahi?
Executive: Nahi nahaye dhoye na matlab aise thodi na seedha seedha aa gaye. Office ke paas to rehte hai sir hum log.
Customer: Hmm. Nimesh Nimesh se baat karta hu bhai ji thoda sa uljha hu halka sa ek uljhan me. Ye ye kya karwa do sir aankho aankho me dard ho raha hai sir. Laptop dekh dekh ke aankhe jalan ho rahi hai soye nahi hai do din se.
Customer: To meri galti thodi hai bhai. Manager manager manager ki shadi hai. Achha achha madam madam madam ki kya bolte kitne din ki chutti pe madam? Kitne din ki chutti pe madam?
Executive: Madam to aayengi madam to aayengi agle mahine.
Customer: Kab kab aayengi agle mahine matlab kab? Wahi 10 10 ke aas paas 7 8 ke wo thiri thiri waale bhi rehte hai na baad me bahut sare. Matlab 10 se 10 aisa bol rahe ho aap?
Executive: Ha ha ha wo sab nipatwa ke sab khatam watam kar ke aise hi aayengi.
Customer: Achha 10 se 10. Aur sir?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur sir unki jo unki jo hai na wo bhi. Hmm. Achha ek ek mahina unka do do din ka chutti hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hmm. Thik hai wo. Isliye isliye madam madam ki shadi to ho gayi lekin madam jab shadi ke baad aayengi to fir hamare upar pad jayengi sir karwa dijiyega wo.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Kasam se aankhe apne aap band ho rahi hai sir jabardasti kholni pad rahi hai.
Customer: Mujhe pata hai sir raat bhar jaage isme kya hota hai.
Executive: Neend aati nahi hai gaadi me thoda idhar udhar kabhi idhar sir kabhi udhar sir.
Customer: 6 ghante ki drive hai na 6 ghante 8 ghante.
Executive: Ji 8 ghante ki.
Customer: 8 ghanta. Teen teen ghanta Agra ho gaya ki teen ghanta fir kya bolte hai aapka wo ho gaya Lucknow ho gaya 6 ghanta ye ho gaya aur do ghanta aage kya bolte hai Ayodhya. 8 ghanta thik hai.
Executive: A aap aap mai bol du Nimesh ko call kare to aap utha loge ek baar. Thoda isko keh raha hai kuch keh raha hai kuch karna to hai nahi matlab sab to ho hi rakha hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi kuch kuch issue nahi hai thoda sa mujhe samajh do bas 10 minute ka. Mai mai khud hi phone kar raha hu. Bas actually achchi baat pata hai achchi baat ye hai ki kya bolte hai sab kuch wo ho gaya nipat gaya hai. Bas mai khud hi usko kya bolte hai wo kar raha hu phone kar raha hu. 10 minute 10 minute 10 minute kar raha hu.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai kar lo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to connect with Nimesh.

- Customer has eye pain due to laptop use.

- Wants pending work to be completed.



Resolution:

- Executive will have Nimesh call the customer.

- Customer will call Nimesh himself after 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, pending work, nimesh
